Interface ec.meta.Const

public interface interface Const
extends Final
Const is a marker interface for objects which are necessarily transitively immutable immediately after construction. One of the restrictions imposed by the Guest Loader is that the only objects which may be pointed at through static variables are Consts. This is done to prevent covert communication between objects. Note, if we decide to let the guest loader load subclasses of Const, we will have to verify the immutability constraint (in particular, all vars are final and either point at Const objects or are scalars). If not, we need merely be sure by inspection that our subclasses are safe.
